page.title: 02INDUSTRY IN RAUNDS
page.content:
SMITH'S CONTAINERS is at the bottom of Thorpe Street. It makes plastic containers and the factory itself is very large and modern. It is two floors high and employs many people.
COGGIN'S factory is up the top of Marshalls Road and is about half the size of Smith's. They make shoes and the factory is an old brick building.
THE TANNERY is in Wellington Road and the factory is very large. It makes shoe cuttings and leather to send to shoe factories.
There are many other factories in Raunds that have closed down now. Two of these are Spire Shoes and James Chambers, which have closed because of the economic depression.
